localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.title: RT @AP: Six Dr. Seuss books — including “And to Think That I Saw It on Mulberry Street” and “If I Ran the Zoo” — will stop being published…
blogPost.author: The_Real_Fly

sharedContent.title: Six Dr. Seuss books — including “And to Think That I Saw It on Mulberry Street” and “If I Ran the Zoo” — will stop being published because of racist and insensitive imagery, the business that preserves and protects the author's legacy said. https://t.co/FB2boW7ao0
sharedContent.author: The Associated Press

localize.full_text: RT @AP: 六本苏斯博士的书--包括《我在桑树街看到的》和《如果我开动物园》--将停止出版... ...
localize.retweeted_status_full_text: 六本苏斯博士的书--包括 "想想我在桑树街看到了它 "和 "如果我跑了动物园"--将停止出版，因为种族主义和不敏感的图像，保存和保护作者遗产的业务说。https://t.co/FB2boW7ao0。

localize.full_text: RT @AP: 六本蘇斯博士的書--包括《我在桑樹街看到的》和《如果我開動物園》--將停止出版... ...
localize.retweeted_status_full_text: 六本蘇斯博士的書--包括 "想想我在桑樹街看到了它 "和 "如果我跑了動物園"--將停止出版，因爲種族主義和不敏感的圖像，保存和保護作者遺產的業務說。https://t.co/FB2boW7ao0。

previous.excerpt: Sprint Poker is an intuitive, lightweight estimation tool that fits into your existing Jira workflow. 🗳️ Estimates that sync back to Jira automagically 🃏 Interactive cards and custom estimation scales ⏰ Async friendly for distributed teams
previous.title: Sprint Poker by Parabol - Remotely bring planning poker to life

localize.description: Sprint Poker是一个直观的，轻量级的估算工具，适合你现有的Jira工作流程。🗳️ 估算可以自动同步回Jira 🃏 交互式卡片和自定义估算尺度 ⏰ 对分布式团队的同步友好。
localize.tagline: 远程将规划扑克带入生活

localize.description: Sprint Poker是一個直觀的，輕量級的估算工具，適合你現有的Jira工作流程。🗳️ 估算可以自動同步回Jira 🃏 交互式卡片和自定義估算尺度 ⏰ 對分佈式團隊的同步友好。
localize.tagline: 遠程將規劃撲克帶入生活

next.excerpt: Who you follow is one of the most important aspects of the Clubhouse app. The Rooms that are shown to users are based on which people and Clubs you choose to follow. I compiled a list of 200 most influential people to follow on Clubhouse.
next.title: People of Clubhouse - Most influential people on Clubhouse

localize.description: 你关注谁是会所应用最重要的方面之一。显示给用户的房间是基于你选择关注的人和俱乐部。我整理了一份名单，列出了200个在Clubhouse上最有影响力的人。
你關注誰是會所應用最重要的方面之一。顯示給用戶的房間是基於你選擇關注的人和俱樂部。我整理了一份名單，列出了200個在Clubhouse上最有影響力的人。
